overview: The Guv'nor (released in the U.S. as Mr. Hobo) is a 1935 British comedy film starring George Arliss as a tramp who rides a series of misunderstandings and becomes the president of a bank.
tagline: HERE'S A NEW ARLISS FOR YOU! a completely new personality as a happy-go-lucky rolling stone.
title: The Guv'nor
